mod.config:
TOURNEY = { ["12:30"] = {level = {200, 399}, round_rewards = {{5809,1}, {7439, 2},{2160, 50},{2273, 1}}, global = 1}, ["17:30"] = {level = {400, 699}, round_rewards = {{5809,1}, {7439, 2},{2160, 50},{2273, 1}}, global = 2}, ["20:30"] = {level = {700, 851}, round_rewards = {{5809,1}, {7439, 2},{2160, 50},{2273, 1}}, global = 3} }
TOURNEY_CONFIG = { GROUP = 1, ARENA = {START = {{x = 1362, y = 1058, z = 6},{x = 1365, y = 1085, z = 6}}, EXIT = {x = 1028, y = 848, z = 5}, AREA = {{x = 1375, y = 1063, z = 7},{x = 1385, y = 1081, z = 7}}, FIGHT = {{x = 1375, y = 1063, z = 7},{x = 1385, y = 1081,+ z = 7}}}, NOT_ALLOWED = {SKULL_WHITE, SKULL_RED, SKULL_BLACK}, TIME_TO_FINISH = {10, "min"}, WARNING_MSG = {true, {3, "min"}}, GLOBAL_TOURNEY = 54300 }+
function mathtime(table) local unit = {"sec", "min", "hour", "day"} for i, v in pairs(unit) do if v == table[2] then return table[1]*(60^(v == unit[4] and 2 or i-1))*(v == unit[4] and 24 or 1) end end return error("Bad declaration in mathtime function.") end
function getItemsFromTable(items) local str = '' if table.maxn(items) > 0 then for i = 1, table.maxn(items) do str = str .. items[i][2] .. ' ' .. getItemNameById(items[i][1]) if i ~= table.maxn(items) then str = str .. '\n' end end end return str end
function getTourneyInfo() local text = "Hour -- [Level Range]\n" for hour, v in pairs(TOURNEY) do text = text .. "\n".. hour .." --- [" .. v.level[1] .. "-" .. v.level[2] .. "]\n\n" text = text .. "Rewards:\n" .. getItemsFromTable(v.round_rewards) .. "\n" if getGlobalStorageValue(TOURNEY_CONFIG.GLOBAL_TOURNEY) == v.global then text = text .. "~~{Running NOW!}~~\n" end end return text end
function getTourneyLevel() for i, v in pairs(TOURNEY) do if getGlobalStorageValue(TOURNEY_CONFIG.GLOBAL_TOURNEY) == v.global then return v end end return nil end
function doRemovePlayerTourney(uid) db.query("DELETE FROM `tourneio` WHERE `player_id` = " .. getPlayerGUID(uid) .. ";") end
function getPlayersTourneyByLevel(level) local players = {} query = db.getResult("SELECT `player_id` FROM `tourneio`") if (query:getID() == -1) then return {} end repeat local tid = getPlayerByNameWildcard(getPlayerNameByGUID(query:getDataInt("player_id"))) if tid and getPlayerLevel(tid) >= level[1] and getPlayerLevel(tid) <= level[2] then table.insert(players, tid) end until not query:next() query:free() return players end
function doFirstRound(players, comp) local g = doPlayersGroups(players, comp) for i = 1, 2 do for k = 1, comp do local tid = g[i][k] if isPlayer(tid) and (not isInArray(TOURNEY_CONFIG.NOT_ALLOWED, getCreatureSkullType(tid))) then doCreatureSetPartyShield(tid, (i == 1 and SHIELD_YELLOW or SHIELD_BLUE)) doTeleportThing(tid, TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.FIGHT[i]) doPlayerSendTextMessage(tid, MESSAGE_INFO_DESCR, "IT'S TIME!") doRemovePlayerTourney(tid) end end doSendMagicEffect(TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.FIGHT[i], CONST_ME_TELEPORT) end end
function getArenaPositions(from, to) local arenaPositions = {} for x = from.x, to.x do for y = from.y, to.y do local pos = {x = x, y = y, z = from.z} table.insert(arenaPositions, pos) end end return arenaPositions end
function doCleanArena() local arenaTiles = getArenaPositions(TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.AREA[1], TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.AREA[2]) for _, pos in ipairs(arenaTiles) do doCleanTile(pos) end doRemoveSummons() end
function doRemoveSummons() local players = getPlayersInArea(TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.AREA[1], TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.AREA[2]) for i = 1, #players do local summons = getCreatureSummons(players[i]) if #summons > 0 then for k = 1, #summons do doRemoveCreature(summons[k]) end end end end
function getPlayersInArea(fromPos, toPos) local players = {} for _, pid in ipairs(getPlayersOnline()) do if isInRange(getPlayerPosition(pid), fromPos, toPos) then table.insert(players, pid) end end return players end
function isLevelAllowedInTourney(cid) for i, v in pairs(TOURNEY) do if getPlayerLevel(cid) >= v.level[1] and getPlayerLevel(cid) <= v.level[2] then return true end end return false end
function doFinishEvent(range) doCleanArena() setGlobalStorageValue(TOURNEY_CONFIG.GLOBAL_TOURNEY, -1) local players = getPlayersTourneyByLevel(range) for i = 1, #players do doRemovePlayerTourney(players[i]) end local combating = getPlayersInArea(TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.AREA[1], TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.AREA[2]) if #combating > 0 then for i = 1, #combating do if isPlayer(combating[i]) then doTeleportThing(combating[i], TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.EXIT) end end doSendMagicEffect(TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.EXIT, CONST_ME_TELEPORT) end doBroadcastMessage("Tourney has finished!", MESSAGE_STATUS_WARNING) end
function doPlayersGroups(players, comp) local groups, rest = {}, #players % comp local count = (#players - rest)/comp local r, last = shuffle(players), {} if count > 0 then for i = 1, count do local tmp = {} for k = 1, comp do tmp[#tmp+1] = r[1] table.remove(r, 1) end table.insert(groups, tmp) end if rest ~= 0 then for k = 1, #groups do for j = 1, #players do if not isInArray(groups[j], players[k]) then if not isInArray(last, players[k]) then table.insert(last, players[k]) end else table.remove(last, 1) end end end while #last%comp ~= 0 do table.insert(last, 0) end table.insert(groups, last) end else local temp = players while #temp%comp ~= 0 do table.insert(temp, 0) end return temp end return groups end
function resetTourneyOnStartUp() setGlobalStorageValue(TOURNEY_CONFIG.GLOBAL_TOURNEY, -1) db.query("TRUNCATE `tourneio`;") end
function shuffle(array) local n, random, j = table.getn(array), math.random for i=1, n do j,k = random(n), random(n) array[j],array[k] = array[k],array[j] end return array end
mod.event: function onLogin(cid) registerCreatureEvent(cid, "TourneyPVP") registerCreatureEvent(cid, "TourneyAttack") if getPlayerStorageValue(cid, TOURNEY_CONFIG.GLOBAL_TOURNEY) == 1 then doPlayerSendTextMessage(cid, MESSAGE_STATUS_CONSOLE_ORANGE, "You was removed from tourney's list because you had logged out.") setPlayerStorageValue(cid, TOURNEY_CONFIG.GLOBAL_TOURNEY, -1) end return true end

function onLogout(cid) query = db.getResult("SELECT * FROM `tourneio` WHERE `player_id` = " .. getPlayerGUID(cid) .. "") if query:getID() == 0 then doRemovePlayerTourney(cid) setPlayerStorageValue(cid, TOURNEY_CONFIG.GLOBAL_TOURNEY, 1) doCreatureSetPartyShield(cid, SHIELD_NONE) return true end return true end

domodlib('TourneyPVP_func') function onCombat(cid, target) if isPlayer(cid) and isPlayer(target) then if (isInRange(getPlayerPosition(cid), TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.AREA[1], TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.AREA[2]) and getCreaturePartyShield(cid) == getCreaturePartyShield(target)) then return false end return true end return true end

domodlib('TourneyPVP_func') function onKill(cid, target, damage, flags) if not isPlayer(target) or not isPlayer(cid) then return true end local players = getPlayersInArea(TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.AREA[1], TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.AREA[2]) if not isInArray(players, target) then return true end addEvent(doCleanArena, 100) local shield = getCreaturePartyShield(cid) local t = getTourneyLevel()
if isInArray(players, target) then for _, dead in pairs(players) do if dead == target then table.remove(players, _) doRemovePlayerTourney(target) end end end
local check = true local check_again = false
for i = 1, #players do if getCreaturePartyShield(players[i]) ~= shield then check = false break end end local tourney_players = getPlayersTourneyByLevel(t.level)
if check == true then local r = t.round_rewards for i = 1, #players do for k = 1, #r do if not isItemStackable(r[k][1]) then for j = 1, r[k][2] do doPlayerAddItem(players[i], r[k][1], 1) end else doPlayerAddItem(players[i], r[k][1], r[k][2]) end end doSendAnimatedText(getPlayerPosition(players[i]), "WINNER!", COLOR_ORANGE) end if #tourney_players < TOURNEY_CONFIG.GROUP and #tourney_players > 0 then for i = 1, #tourney_players do local tid = tourney_players[i] if isPlayer(tid) then if (not isInArray(TOURNEY_CONFIG.NOT_ALLOWED, getCreatureSkullType(tid))) then doCreatureSetPartyShield(tid, (shield == SHIELD_YELLOW and SHIELD_BLUE or SHIELD_YELLOW)) doTeleportThing(tid, TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.FIGHT[1]) doPlayerSendTextMessage(tid, MESSAGE_INFO_DESCR, "IT'S TIME!") doRemovePlayerTourney(tid) else doRemovePlayerTourney(tid) if #getPlayersTourneyByLevel(t.level) == 0 then check_again = true break end end end end elseif #tourney_players >= TOURNEY_CONFIG.GROUP then g = doPlayersGroups(tourney_players, TOURNEY_CONFIG.GROUP)[1] for i = 1, TOURNEY_CONFIG.GROUP do if isPlayer(g[i]) then if (not isInArray(TOURNEY_CONFIG.NOT_ALLOWED, getCreatureSkullType(g[i]))) then doCreatureSetPartyShield(g[i], (shield == SHIELD_YELLOW and SHIELD_BLUE or SHIELD_YELLOW)) doTeleportThing(g[i], TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.FIGHT[1]) doPlayerSendTextMessage(g[i], MESSAGE_INFO_DESCR, "IT'S TIME!") doRemovePlayerTourney(g[i]) else doRemovePlayerTourney(g[i]) if #getPlayersTourneyByLevel(t.level) == 0 then check_again = true break end end end end doSendMagicEffect(TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.FIGHT[1], CONST_ME_TELEPORT) else for i = 1, #players do doTeleportThing(players[i], TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.EXIT) doPlayerSendTextMessage(players[i], MESSAGE_STATUS_CONSOLE_ORANGE, "You have no more opponents to fight.") doCreatureSetPartyShield(players[i], SHIELD_NONE) end doSendMagicEffect(TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.EXIT, CONST_ME_TELEPORT) end end if check_again == true then local new_players = getPlayersInArea(TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.AREA[1], TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.AREA[2]) for i = 1, #new_players do doTeleportThing(new_players[i], TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.EXIT) doPlayerSendTextMessage(new_players[i], MESSAGE_STATUS_CONSOLE_ORANGE, "You have no more opponents to fight.") doCreatureSetPartyShield(new_players[i], SHIELD_NONE) end doSendMagicEffect(TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.EXIT, CONST_ME_TELEPORT) end return true end

if param == "" then doPlayerPopupFYI(cid, "Use:\n!tourney go - Join in tourney's list\n!tourney leave - Leave tourney's list\n!tourney info - Get information about tourney")

mod.globalevent: domodlib('TourneyPVP_func') function onThink(interval, lastExecution) if TOURNEY[os.date("%X", os.time() + mathtime(TOURNEY_CONFIG.WARNING_MSG[2])):sub(1,5)] then if TOURNEY_CONFIG.WARNING_MSG[1] then doBroadcastMessage("O Torneio PvP vai comecar em "..TOURNEY_CONFIG.WARNING_MSG[2][1].." "..TOURNEY_CONFIG.WARNING_MSG[2][2]..". use o Comando !torneio go . Para Participar ! Mais informacoes Sobre o Evento use !torneio info", MESSAGE_STATUS_WARNING) return true end end local t = TOURNEY[os.date("%X"):sub(1,5)] if t then local players = getPlayersTourneyByLevel(t.level) if #players < 2 * TOURNEY_CONFIG.GROUP then doBroadcastMessage("O Torneio PVP nao comecou pois nao Haviam players suficiente.", MESSAGE_STATUS_WARNING) for i = 1, #players do doRemovePlayerTourney(players[i]) end return true end for i = 1, #players do doTeleportThing(players[i], TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.START) end doSendMagicEffect(TOURNEY_CONFIG.ARENA.START, CONST_ME_TELEPORT) doBroadcastMessage("O Torneio esta comecando! Preparem-se !", MESSAGE_STATUS_WARNING) addEvent(doFirstRound, 5 * 1000, players, TOURNEY_CONFIG.GROUP) addEvent(doFinishEvent, mathtime(TOURNEY_CONFIG.TIME_TO_FINISH) * 1000, t.level) setGlobalStorageValue(TOURNEY_CONFIG.GLOBAL_TOURNEY, t.global) end return true end
domodlib('TourneyPVP_func') function onStartup() resetTourneyOnStartUp() return true end
